        <description>Fix script to upgrade records to comply with latest enhancements</description>
        <name>PSM Record Upgrade (Nov 2022)</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[// Update Approval Rule records to migrate user from purchasing rule/user attribute to approving user
function updateApprovalRules() {
    var ruleGr = new GlideRecord('sn_shop_approval_rule');
    var query = 'purchasing_userISNOTEMPTY';
    ruleGr.addEncodedQuery(query);
    ruleGr.query();
    while (ruleGr.next()) {
        var payload = {};
        var approving_user = ruleGr.getValue('purchasing_user');
        if (!gs.nil(ruleGr.getValue('purchasing_user_attribute')))
            approving_user += '.' + ruleGr.purchasing_user_attribute;
        ruleGr.setValue('approving_user', approving_user);
        ruleGr.update();
    }
}
// Update existing Approval Group records to have approving object has purchase requisition
function updateApprovalGroups() {
    var groupGr = new GlideRecord('sn_shop_approval_group');
    var query = 'approving_objectISEMPTY';
    groupGr.addEncodedQuery(query);
    groupGr.query();
    while (groupGr.next()) {
        var payload = {};
        groupGr.setValue('approving_object', 'sn_shop_purchase_requisition');
        groupGr.update();
    }
}
updateApprovalRules();
updateApprovalGroups();]]></script>
